column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We tried the pulled pork hush puppies (3.5/5)
column3: and pork belly poutine with a fried egg on top (5/5). The pulled pork hush puppies were ok
column4: but the breading to filling ratio was off. However
column5: the Carolina bbq mustard dipping sauce was really nice and complimented the hush puppies nicely.
